703105f-a.text:
Battery Avenue, north from Poly Place, at Fort Hamilton, showing the W. P. A. conducting a highway and sewer project.  On the left are some of the buildings of the U. S. Army Rervation (sp.?), and on the right is the Polytechnic Preparatory School.

September 26, 1935

Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
703105f-a.folder: Battery Avenue & Poly Place, Brooklyn, NY
